channel.title: sys-whonix question
channel.description:
I finally decided to install qubes-os, when it boots up I have qubes vm manager running inside it are dom0 sys-net sys-firewall sys-whonix
If I right click on the sys-whonix and select settings it says NetVM: is sys-firewall(current) is this correct? As I see default (sys-whonix) sys-net and sys-whonix or none in there also?
I just want to make sure it is set up correctly before I use it.

item.title: sys-whonix question
item.dc:creator: Temple
item.description:
I finally decided to install qubes-os, when it boots up I have qubes vm manager running inside it are
dom0
sys-net
sys-firewall
sys-whonix

If I right click on the sys-whonix and select settings it says NetVM: is sys-firewall(current) is this correct? As I see default (sys-whonix) sys-net and sys-whonix or none in there also?

I just want to make sure it is set up correctly before I use it.

Read full topic
